ygData.subject: Re: Level 24 Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: It wasn t in Grobb the other day - the 20th level pet was there and the 29th level pet.  I am desperately looking for the 24th pet spell now or word of
ygData.messageBody:
It wasn't in Grobb the other day - the 20th level pet was there and the 29th level pet. I am desperately looking for the 24th pet spell now or word of detchment, if anybody has them for sale on Innoruuk please tell me! I'm only 21 so I have 3 levels before I need it.

Mored Dhel
21st Level Dark Elf Necromancer

From: Fraal
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 2:10 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 24 Pet


not Oggok, it is in Grobb . . .
